steps.desc: Slide weapon ring over base, along with v bearings
Wire up Rx, ESCs and motors
Place wheel hub into the tyre mould
Pour in rubber to overmould the tyre
Once dry, remove the finished tyre from the mould
Screw the hammer plates onto the weapon ring
